attributes.background:
As above.

Following the Nuremberg Code

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the provision of medical treatment, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

It is already against the law for people to be required to undergo medical treatment, except in very limited circumstances. You can find out more about consent for medical treatment here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/consent-to-treatment/
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
